__e: Or Doyle wouldn't be the only man to lose his wife and daughter.
Well, we've got a job to do, Mrs. Holland, and getting men like your husband isn't easy.
I don't see how that's gonna help your case, Doyle, at all.
Doyle is the only one who can stop them all.
Yeah, your boy's a pansy. But Doyle's a big strong guy.
